ol.li:
Antibody-Coated Particle Solution
(Liquid when used, 150 μL/Immunoreaction Cartridge)
Contains 250 μg/mL anti-total Tau monoclonal antibody (mouse)-coated particles, protein stabilizers (bovine) in 50 mM Tris buffer. This solution contains gelatin and turns into gel at 15 °C or lower. Preservative: 0.1% ProClin 300.

Biotinylated Antibody Solution
(Liquid, 120 μL/Immunoreaction Cartridge)
Contains 8 μg/mL biotinylated anti-total Tau antibody (mouse), protein (bovine) and chemical stabilizers in 50 mM Tris buffer. Preservative: 0.1% ProClin 300.

Enzyme-Labeled Streptavidin Solution
(Liquid, 350 μL/Immunoreaction Cartridge)
Contains 0.08 μg/mL alkaline phosphatase (ALP)-labeled streptavidin, protein (bovine) and chemical stabilizers in 50 mM MES buffer. Preservative: 0.1% ProClin 300.
